Keywords: Acolytes , Brotherhood of Mutants , Hellfire Club , Politician , Quiet Council , Ruler , S.W.O.R.D. , X-Men
Real Name: Max Eisenhardt
Special Powers
TARGETING: Characters
PREPARED FOR INVASION: Opposing characters within range and line of fire using Impervious, Shape Change or Super Senses decrease their result for those powers by -1 (a 6 is always a success).
MAGNETIC REPULSION: Running Shot. When Magneto uses it, after resolutions he may use Force Blast as FREE.
MAGNETIC DEFENSES: Energy Shield/Deflection, Invulnerability, and this character has SAFEGUARD: Mind Control.

Yarisdriver
This outfit kinda reminds me of micheal fassbender in dark phoenix.
July 5, 2022
DarkTortoise23
His trait is what they gave JLU common batman, but with flight, improved targeting and better staying power, for 5 points less. Love it, fills such a good niche, excellent replacement figure on brotherhood and x men teams if you're dealing with spider mans or skrulls.
July 5, 2022
Mattlikethepaint
Being immune to Mind Control is rarely useful but is such a fun and flavourful thing that I wish more Magnetos had.
June 22, 2022
Redrover454
I want this guy in my collection YESTERDAY! A full dial of PenPsych and ESD with IT: Characters for 65pts is great by itself, but that's just the start. His Speed Box gives you great repositioning (Carry, RS, then knockback), his trait is awesome for helping get your damage through when Outwit isn't available, and with Enhancement and Perplex, he'll be boosting numbers as long as he's on the map. 8/10 fig for me.
June 17, 2022
Battletank
This is a great Magneto and Magnetic Defenses is one of the best defensive powers I have ever seen on a Magneto. Well done.
